segments.text: The sight of the children trying to sneak cookies fills me with a sense of joy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their playful antics remind me of my own childhood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But at the same time, I feel a pinch of worry for that boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The precariousness of his position is almost too much to bear.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman seems so focused, it's almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't shake off the idea that she would be furious if she caught them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, there’s something sweet about the innocence of their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re not doing anything truly harmful, just satisfying a craving.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, I can't help but feel a twist in my stomach at the thought of them getting caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their laughter would turn to silence in a heartbeat if the woman noticed.
segments.speaker: PAR
